author: andschwa
body:
When ready, we will switch `dnxcore50` to ~~`netcore50`~~ `netstandard1.4`, and `dnx451` to `net451`.

These are the eventual ~~[target frameworks](https://docs.nuget.org/create/targetframeworks)~~ and the [.NET Platform Standard](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/blob/master/Documentation/architecture/net-platform-standard.md).

The former is blocked on dotnet/cli#1043, and the latter @fearthecowboy is already doing in a feature branch.

/cc @vors

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Blah, I think the former link is already out of date and the latter is all that matters. Editing comment.

title: Switch to .NET Platform Standard
